title: Mystery Skin for good behaviour
body: My account was chat restricted 1 time for a while. Does this mean i'll never get to have a mystery skin for good behaviour ever again?

replies.body:
I'm guessing that you're referencing [this event](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/game-updates/special-event/celebrating-end-years-snowdown), when we last gifted for this *particular reason*. Your eligibility to earn a gift for an event entirely depend on the requirements for that event, I can't speculate on something that has yet to be announced or planned.

I hope this helps in some capacity. Let me know if you have any questions.
